code: export var getSavedrouteIds=function getSavedrouteIds(){var savedrouteIds=localStorage.getItem("saved_routes")?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("saved_routes")):[];return savedrouteIds;};export var saverouteIds=function saverouteIds(routeIdArr){if(routeIdArr.length){localStorage.setItem("saved_routes",JSON.stringify(routeIdArr));}else{localStorage.removeItem("saved_routes");}};export var removeRouteId=function removeRouteId(routeId){var savedrouteIds=localStorage.getItem("saved_routes")?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("saved_routes")):null;if(!savedrouteIds){return false;}var updatedSavedrouteIds=savedrouteIds===null||savedrouteIds===void 0?void 0:savedrouteIds.filter(function(savedrouteId){return savedrouteId!==routeId;});localStorage.setItem("saved_routes",JSON.stringify(updatedSavedrouteIds));return true;};
